challenges_A.title: Long downtimes and slow troubleshooting
challenges_A.des: Network inefficiencies can lead to extended service outages and delays in identifying and fixing issues.

challenges_A.title: Increased operational costs
challenges_A.des: Unoptimized networks drive up expenses for maintenance, bandwidth, and hardware replacements.

challenges_A.title: Poor user experience
challenges_A.des: Slow networks disrupt workflows, frustrate employees, and lead to dissatisfaction among customers.

challenges_B.title: Security vulnerabilities
challenges_B.des: Outdated or poorly maintained networks are easier targets for cyberattacks, putting sensitive data at risk.

challenges_B.title: Limited scalability
challenges_B.des: Without proper network planning, growth becomes difficult and can create performance bottlenecks.

challenges_B.title: Lack of visibility
challenges_B.des: Failing to monitor and control your network, might lead to reactive rather than proactive problem-solving.
